name: Pixica MIUI 9 Theme
description:
MiUI Pixica Key Features:
 Pure Pixel feel Homescreen 
Pixel weather Widget Stock 
Android Bootanimation 
500+ rounded icons are added 
Stock Android like colorful contacts icons in Dialler/SMS 
Android AOSP style Settings Material design Music 
Double Tap on Homescreen to change wallpaper 
7 days auto wallpaper change in Lockscreen 
Some 3rd party apps are themed
